pkgmetadata.longdescription: Project flashcam================`FLASk supported webCAM`*IN DEVELOPMENT*Here, the merge of several ideas forms an easy (pip) installable webcamserver. The basic goal is to- view various technical devices during an experiment - with an info on delay - some record capabilities- have some tools to get more from the streamTechnical=========- the camera itself is launched from *web.py* function *frames()*, where*Camera()* class (defined in *real~camerra~.py*) is called first.Usage=====See README.howto.orgOr run with *-h*
